Phobias baby relayed the emotions back to him.

"What a disgusting thought, a wolf and a dungbeetle, what would the 
puppies look like" He thought as the feelings were relayed to him. 

"He opened a link to his baby "Excuse me my leader but isn't there 
some rule about fratranizing with the hired help when there's a 
battle to be fought?" He said in an agitated voice. Drillbits 
influence was weekening her. He couldn't afford to have a week pawn.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She felt his arms go around her and hold her.  She kissed him and 
> felt her spark jump and beat faster.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > ::DrillBit::
> > 
> > DrillBit forgot all about the attack. He held KitKat close, and
> > continued the kiss.
> > 
> > ::K9::
> > 
> > K9 heard Phobia over the comm. He replyed.
> > "Ok, lets talk. Beast mode!" He tranformed, to golden retrever 
mode.
